entry.title: New release for Fladder: v0.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

This version includes the option to select video backends the current options are * LibMPV -> The default and original option * LibMDK -> New experimental option.

This is a pretty big (but invisible) change, for now LibMPV will be the default option for all platforms. Web only supports LibMPV, so there will be no backend select option available.

Exciting New Features üèï

  • feature: Added LibMDK video player backend by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/162
  • feature: Handle all media segments skipping by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/167
  • feature(Android): Enabled impeller for devices that support Vulkan.

Bugfixes üêû

  • fix: Improve sanitizing for trickplay by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/158
  • fix(macOS): Using correct icon assets by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/161
  • fix: Player orientation title by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/166

Other Changes

  • chore: Update MPV package to latest version by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/165
  • chore: Updated translations from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/153

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/compare/v0.4.4...v0.5.0
